pageContent: Objective: To assess testosterone and haemoglobin kinetics in the Postoperative Adjuvant Androgen Deprivation (PAAD) trial, and correlate these with quality of life (QoL) in this prospective randomized study.

metaData.source:
[Surgical approach and sexual outcomes after radical prostatectomy]
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/28392432/
